definition: peat
mud/clay/paste/pulp
restrained
coal/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: The nickel adsorbed on peat increase together with the raise of nickel concentration in the solution.
sentences.chinese: 吸附液鎳濃度升高，泥煤吸附鎳量增加。

sentences.english: Natural chemical reactions also take place when iron rusts , or when peat is formed.
sentences.chinese: 鐵生鏽和泥煤的形成也是天然的化學反應。

sentences.english: In this state the material is peat .
sentences.chinese: 在這種狀態中，有一種叫泥煤的東西。

sentences.english: The best solution for neutralising acidic or peaty soil.
sentences.chinese: 最佳的解答爲中立化酸性或泥煤似土壤。

definition: euphemistic equivalent of 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
labor and capital/labor and management

to stop one's pen/to break off writing/final remarks (at the end of a book or article)
